summary: Comprehensive testing of textile production module completed successfully. All backend APIs working, frontend CRUD operations functional, production matrix working perfectly, dark mode toggle operational.

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with correct stats display
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Marcas, Tipos, Entalles, Telas, Hilos, Modelos, Registros)
Marcas CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Production Matrix functionality (add tallas, add colors, input quantities, totals calculation)
